similar

  • similar(obj: SimObject, tolerance?: number): boolean

  • Inherited from SimObject.similar

    • Defined in davinci-newton/core/SimObject.ts:22

    Returns true if the given SimObject is similar to this SimObject for display purposes. SimObjects are similar when they are the same type and nearly the same size and location. Mainly used when showing forces - to avoid adding too many objects to the display.

    Parameters

    • obj: SimObject
    • Optional tolerance: number

    Returns boolean
